json_to_edit.voice_over: The typewriter's keys moved on their own, revealing secrets of the future.
json_to_edit.description: Eleanor discovers a haunted typewriter that predicts future events.
json_to_edit.location: Dusty attic of an old Victorian house
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with a single beam of moonlight
json_to_edit.name: Prophetic Typewriter
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Eleanor finds a haunted typewriter that writes future events on its own.

qa.action: Eleanor enters the attic, moonlight revealing dusty furniture and stacks of old books.

hf.action: Eleanor's eyes widen as she spots an antique typewriter on a weathered desk.

tr.action: Eleanor approaches the typewriter cautiously, her hand reaching out to touch it.

xc.action: The typewriter's keys begin to move on their own, startling Eleanor.

ka.action: Words appear on the paper: 'Tomorrow's headline: Unexpected storm causes citywide blackout.'

fn.sfx_keywords: sharp intake of breath, owl hooting
fn.action: Eleanor steps back, a mix of fear and fascination on her face.

af.action: The typewriter continues typing, revealing more future events.

qo.action: The attic window bursts open, scattering papers around the room as Eleanor watches in awe.

fp.action: The typewriter's carriage returns, finishing its prophecy as Eleanor leans in to read.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every two existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: The typewriter's keys moved on their own, revealing secrets of the future.
updated_json.description: Eleanor discovers a haunted typewriter that predicts future events.
updated_json.location: Dusty attic of an old Victorian house
updated_json.lighting: Dim, with a single beam of moonlight
updated_json.name: Prophetic Typewriter
updated_json.scene_summary: Eleanor finds a haunted typewriter that writes future events on its own.

qa.action: Eleanor enters the attic, moonlight revealing dusty furniture and stacks of old books.

hf.action: Eleanor's eyes widen as she spots an antique typewriter on a weathered desk.

yz.action: The moonlight shifts, casting eerie shadows across the room as Eleanor hesitates.

tr.action: Eleanor approaches the typewriter cautiously, her hand reaching out to touch it.

xc.action: The typewriter's keys begin to move on their own, startling Eleanor.

wx.action: The camera pans across the attic, revealing old artifacts and hidden corners as the typewriter continues its eerie typing.

ka.action: Words appear on the paper: 'Tomorrow's headline: Unexpected storm causes citywide blackout.'

fn.sfx_keywords: sharp intake of breath, owl hooting
fn.action: Eleanor steps back, a mix of fear and fascination on her face.

uv.action: Eleanor's trembling hand reaches for the typed prophecy, her eyes wide with disbelief.

af.action: The typewriter continues typing, revealing more future events.

qo.action: The attic window bursts open, scattering papers around the room as Eleanor watches in awe.

st.action: The camera follows a floating paper with a typed prophecy, landing at Eleanor's feet.

fp.action: The typewriter's carriage returns, finishing its prophecy as Eleanor leans in to read.

label.rationale: we will add new shots after every two existing shots in the scene, as requested by the edit command. this will increase the total number of shots from 9 to 13. we'll create four new shots with creative descriptions that fit the scene's atmosphere and narrative. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object to reflect these changes. the new shots will be inserted at appropriate positions to maintain the flow of the scene.
